description: Number of partitions of n into distinct primes (counting 1 as a prime).
mathematica: myprime[ n_ ] := If[ n===0, 1, Prime[ n ] ]; ta1=Table[ Product[ 1+z^myprime[ k ], {k, 1, n} ]~CoefficientList~z, {n, 31, 32} ]; leveled=Count[ Take[ Last@ta1, Length@ta1[ [ -2 ] ] ]-ta1[ [ -2 ] ], 0 ]; Take[ Last@ta1, leveled ]
author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Dec 17 1998
